results.name: Quantum Shift (Centennial Game Development Program, Zantty, JustMey, Jacobsters, Rev)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Sp1
  • Processor: Inter (R) Core (TM) i5-4570 Cpu @ 3.20Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 1050 Ti 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any sound card older then 2014
  • Additional Notes: recommended resolution 1080i
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Sp1 or higher
  • Processor: Inter (R) Core (TM) i5-4570 Cpu @ 3.20Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 1050 Ti 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any sound card 2014
  • Additional Notes: recommended resolution 1080i
